attributes.action: Child sex abusers to be given longer jail and no bail
attributes.additional_details:
possessing drugs get between 2-7 years imprisonments & fine,  producing & distributing drugs,  get up to 14 years to life imprisonment & an fine.
Whereas a person found guilty of sexually abuse is only subject to a maximum of 14 years imprisonment but are allowed on bail & given suspended sentence.
Never doing more than 6 years 
The comparison being based on choice; those who buy drugs from drug dealers usually choose to do so, whereas those victims to sexual abuse have ZERO choice in the matter.
attributes.background:
Minimum of 18 years for taking a child's childhood away , NO parole.
Jail for indecent materials 
NO suspended sentence 
NO to bail
Stricter internet laws on child abuse !
